posts.post_content:
hello,

you never answered my question, why r u out so soon?????:confused:

Nelson, I hate to see you sell this card so cheap.

I found this example to be very interesting because of the 'NY' pencilled on the front.  Demmitt actually went from New York to St. Louis, so seeing 'NY' on his jersey really makes no sense.  That was the original allure of it to me (Nelson acquired it from me).

Any ideas as to why someone would have alluded to Demmitt's former team (New York) on this card?

$700 is a steal.
I'll take it.  PM me with details to send money.

[quote name="Clark7781" post=1017193]I'll take it.  PM me with details to send money.[/QUOTE]


PM sent.

Thanks for closing the deal with me.  Sorry I paid so late, but my businesses, right now, keep me bouncing back and forth between stores because people are on vacation.

Although not as sexy as your Plank, this card is something I hunted for for a long time.  Thank you for the great deal on it.  Although it is well loved, it is perfect for me; that's what I love.  THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU

Thanks for closing the deal with me.  Sorry I paid so late, but my businesses, right now, keep me bouncing back and forth between stores because people are on vacation.

Although not as sexy as your Plank, this card is something I hunted for for a long time.  Thank you for the great deal on it.  Although it is well loved, it is perfect for me; that's what I love.  THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU

Paul,
Congrats on the new pickup.  Nice blog too.  Amazing story.  Welcome back.

Jon:

Thank you for the kind words.  My blog took a back seat to life's events.  Loosing my wife was VERY hard.  With a than five year old to care for and raise, my life kinda went into hiatus for awhile.  But I came out of that void and am back. So thank you for your kind words; it means a lot to me.
